code: import{accountFormatter,currencySymbolGenerator}from'utilities/Generator';import{AMOUNT_OPTION}from'./constants';export var generateAmountOptions=function generateAmountOptions(bills){if(!bills)return[];return[{label:"\u672C\u671F\u61C9\u7E73\u91D1\u984D ".concat(currencySymbolGenerator('NTD',bills.newBalance)),value:AMOUNT_OPTION.ALL},{label:"\u6700\u4F4E\u61C9\u7E73\u91D1\u984D ".concat(currencySymbolGenerator('NTD',bills.minDueAmount)),value:AMOUNT_OPTION.MIN},{label:'自訂金額',value:AMOUNT_OPTION.CUSTOM}];};export var generateAccountNoOptions=function generateAccountNoOptions(accounts){if(!accounts||!accounts.length)return[];return accounts.map(function(v){return{label:accountFormatter(v.accountNo),value:v.accountNo};});};
